thread.title: Need someone for converting models(can't do it on my own)

post.author: Bowserkoopa
post.body:
Hi everybody!
Yesterday, I found a beautiful model from bowser in the internet. That is a models for HL2 and so I can't open them in any other program. I found a program, that is able to convert them, but it needs the HL2 dlls to work. I don't have the game, and don't want to buy it, only for some 3D models.
The Converter is named "cannonfoders hl2 mdl decompiler". Maybe you need also milkshape to convert it into an c4d, 3ds, or another file, that cinema 4D can read. You only need to convert the following model:

http://www.garrysmod.org/downloads/?a=view&id=42142

Would be very nice, if anyone would could do it.

post.author: The Happy Friar
post.body: can you get the Source SDK w/o buying the game? If you can that's how you can handle the models (stupid, imho, because nobody bothered making a separate model tool because you get one with the sdk. Not like D3 with several different model tools/converters)

post.author: TelMarine
post.body: Haha man, so many mods are just a bunch of stolen content. Garry's mod is just a bunch of models imported from other games and offered up for free.

post.author: rich_is_bored
post.body: I take it you don't own a copy of Super Mario Galaxy either?

post.author: Bowserkoopa
post.body: I have Mario Galaxy, but not Half Life 2. I'm not sure if i can get the Source SDK without it, but i heard that the mdlconverter needs the HL2 dll files.

post.author: Bowserkoopa
post.body: Isn't there anybody, who want to convert the model for me?

post.author: =FF=Sturm
post.body:
The Happy Friar wrote:
can you get the Source SDK w/o buying the game? If you can that's how you can handle the models (stupid, imho, because nobody bothered making a separate model tool because you get one with the sdk. Not like D3 with several different model tools/converters)

And of course sucks to work with lot of different tools...
Converting models is easy, but re-make them to look good in a different engine it's another story
Btw, the model (pack) use very bad textures (full white useless alpha maps for no reason) making all textures 32 bits that take too much resources when you are going to use 24 bit ones (RGB)

Also this pack is better imo
http://www.garrysmod.org/downloads/?a=view&id=46451

Offtopic:
Doom3 lololol
just lol
http://www.garrysmod.org/downloads/?a=view&id=20184

post.author: The Happy Friar
post.body: you'd be better off going to a valve-centric site for converting hl2 models. they're the ones who would know how to do it.
